import React from "react";
 
import {isArray,isString,isNumber,extend,mapValues,values} from "lodash";
import {cx} from "emotion";
 
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
 
import {ListviewItem} from "./listview-item";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
// import getChildren from "../utils/children";
import pickHtmlProps from "../utils/pick-html-props";
 
import getListviewStyle from "../styles/listview/listview.style";
 
export class Listview extends React.Component {
 
  itemFactory = (item,index)=>{
 
    const {itemComponent} = this.props;
 
    let onClick = item.onClick || this.props.onClick;
 
    Iif (onClick) {
      onClick = onClick.bind(null,item);
    }
 
    var props = {
      item: item,
      onClick,
    };
 
    if (typeof item === "string") { item = {text: item}; }
 
    [
      "basicLabel",
      "labelVariation",
      "labelEllipsis",
      "labelRight",
      "thumbnail",
      "thumbSize",
      "thumbContained",
      "thumbAlt",
      "thumbBorder",
      "thumbRounded",
      "headingComponent",
      "stackLabels",
      "inverted",
      "borderless",
      "flush",
      "variation",
      "labelWidth",
      "labelMiddle",
    ].forEach(function(prop) {
      props[prop] = (item[prop] == null) ? this.props[prop] : item[prop];
    }.bind(this));
 
    ["label","thumbnail","icon","text","heading","active","href","disabled","children"].forEach(function(prop) {
      props[prop] = item[prop];
    });
 
    props.key = item.key || item.id || `item${index}`;
 
    Iif (item.listviewItemProps) {
      extend(props,item.listviewItemProps);
    }
 
    return React.createElement(itemComponent,props);
  }
 
  render() {
    var {
      component,
      basicLabel,
      stackLabels,
      inverted,
      borderless,
      flush,
      items,
      children,
      noItemsContent,
      itemFactory,
      variation,
      ...otherProps
    } = this.props;
 
    if (!itemFactory) { itemFactory = this.itemFactory; }
 
    const styleFlags = {
      basicLabel,
      stackLabels,
      //stackable: stackLabels === "auto",
      inverted,
      borderless,
      flush,
    };
 
    if (!children) {
      if (!isArray(items)) {
 
        items = values(mapValues(items,(val,key) => {
          return (isString(val) || isNumber(val)) ? {label: key,text: val} : extend({label: key}, val);
        }));
 
        // items = mapValues(items,function(val,key) {
        //   return (isString(val) || isNumber(val)) ? [{label: key,text: val}] : extend([{label: key},val]);
        // });
      }
 
      if (items.length === 0 && noItemsContent) {
        children = noItemsContent;
      }
      else {
        children = items.map(function(item,index) {
          return itemFactory(item,index);
        });
      }
    }
 
    const newProps = pickHtmlProps(mergeProps({
      className: cx("aek-listview",getListviewStyle(styleFlags,variation)),
    },otherProps));
 
    return React.createElement(component,newProps,children);
  }
}
 
Listview.propTypes = {
  onClick: PropTypes.func,
  itemFactory: PropTypes.func,
  formatted: PropTypes.bool,
  itemComponent: PropTypes.component,
  component: PropTypes.component,
  basicLabel: PropTypes.bool,
  stackLabels: PropTypes.bool,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool,
  borderless: PropTypes.bool,
  flush: PropTypes.bool,
  items: PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.object,PropTypes.array]),
  children: PropTypes.node,
  noItemsContent: PropTypes.node,
  variation: PropTypes.variation,
};
 
Listview.defaultProps = {
  component: "ul",
  itemComponent: ListviewItem,
};
